revision.text:
{{Actor| | type = Token | name = Raise alarm | class = RaiseAlarm | game = Strife | convid = 301, 283, 300 }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:Inventory|Inventory]]→[[Classes:DummyStrifeItem|DummyStrifeItem]]→RaiseAlarm
This is a dummy Strife item that is sometimes given to the player during conversations if he responds using the "incorrect" answer. When this item is in the inventory, all monsters surrounding the player are alerted and start attacking. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR RaiseAlarm : {{Class|DummyStrifeItem}} native { {{Property|Tag}} "$TAG_ALARM" // "Alarm" }
